item.description:
Please RSVP!  Don't miss this one!

This will be a special meeting.  We will not be having lesson 10 until next month, so that we can have Justin Nielsen from Investors Business Daily come and speak to us.  Justin works with Bill O'Neil in the Office of the Chairman at IBD.  He is in town to teach a Level I CANSLIM Workshop on Saturday, August 6, but he has prepared a special presentation for us, so you should attend both.  You can find more information on the CANSLIM Workshop here: http://www.investors.com/Products/Default.aspx?id=wshp_l1&src=ibdevnt

Who We Are

This IBD Method is for people who are currently learning and applying IBD tools and the CANSLIM Method to their investing.

Only those seeking to learn the IBD CANSLIM Method should attend.

group.name: Boston Investor's Business Daily Meetup Group

item.name: IBD CANSLIM Meeting - Special Speaker: Justin Nielsen from IBD!
